idea-plugin.name: Remote Debug via WebSocket Proxy
idea-plugin.description:
Debug Java applications through WebSocket proxy.

This plugin adds a new Run/Debug Configuration type that allows you to debug Java applications running in remote environments (such as Kubernetes pods) via a WebSocket proxy.

Features:

  • Debug remote Java applications through WebSocket proxy
  • Support for debugging applications in network-isolated environments
  • Similar to native Remote JVM Debug but with WebSocket tunnel
  • Auto-reconnect support

Usage:

  1. Start the WebSocket proxy server
  2. Create a new "Remote JVM Debug (WebSocket)" configuration
  3. Configure the WebSocket server URL and target application details
  4. Click Debug to start debugging
